generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title Vault
 @notice A contract representing a vault that holds and manages collateral tokens.

constructor.details: Reverts if any of the input parameters are the zero address or bytes32(0).

params._collateralAdapter: The address of the collateral adapter responsible for interacting with the Vault.
params._collateralPoolId: The identifier of the collateral pool associated with the Vault.
params._collateralToken: The address of the ERC20 collateral token held in the Vault.

deposit(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the collateral token adapter, which is responsible for depositing collateral.The Vault contract safely transfers the specified amount of collateral tokens from the caller (collateral token adapter)      to itself.Emits a Deposit event upon a successful deposit.

params._amount: The amount of collateral tokens to deposit.

withdraw(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the collateral token adapter, which is responsible for managing collateral.The Vault contract safely transfers the specified amount of collateral tokens from itself to the caller      (collateral token adapter).Emits a Withdraw event upon a successful withdrawal.

params._amount: The amount of collateral tokens to withdraw.

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit collateral tokens into the Vault.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw collateral tokens from the Vault.

userdoc.notice: A contract representing a vault that holds and manages collateral tokens.
